title: I was charged Double IP for buying Zac
body:
I had around 13,000 IP and when the new bundles came out I was interested in the Freakin' Awesome Tanks Bundle. I only have Cho'Gath out of those champions, but I planned to buy Zac and Nautilius to cut the RP cost. The two champions together cost 12,600 IP, and since I have a bunch of IP that I didn't know what to spend on, I decided to use it there. I first decided to buy Zac, but when I hit purchase with IP, it took away 12,600 IP from my account (I noticed because I only have 758 left). I'm so depressed right now it took me months to get that much IP and I know I wasn't spending it but I actually had plans for it now. I plan on submitting a ticket but it just sucks because I don't know when I'll get my IP refunded if I actually do... And I need to buy Nautilius to cut the RP cost enough to the RP I currently have.

Has anything similar to this happened before to anyone out there? I cri everytiem...

replies.body:
Hey Dolphron!

If this wasn't a visual glitch (which can be fixed by logging out and logging back in), please submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can take a look at your account.
It's usually a display error that fixes itself the next time you gain IP.
Dude support only takes like a day to respond, and if it's an actual error, they fix it fast xD
If that's the case than I have nothing to really worry about, I've submitted tickets before and usually they took about a week so I'm kind of stressing about it haha. But thanks for reassuring me

Yea you should be golden by tomorrow dude.

Happy huntin! {{champion:17}}
